emptyState.title: Ask me anything about Terry
emptyState.description: Press Enter to start or tap a suggestion below. You can also press 1-5 to pick a prompt.

suggestions.1: Show me your services with timelines & deliverables.
suggestions.2: What can you build for a B2B SaaS in 14 days?
suggestions.3: Can you build an AI assistant for my website?
suggestions.4: I want an mvp for my startup idea.
suggestions.5: Can we book a quick call?
